column5: Good morning.  Has anyone fished Maz late in the fall?  We were there on Saturday and we were marking all kinds of fish along the north wall.  Just not sure what they were.  We tried some jigging and trolling, but no luck.   Any info would be appreciated as we may be back there next month.  Regards
Those are probably lakers, i caught some small ones in August last year, but same thing - marked lots but not many takers.  Try spoons and long leads of riggers, maybe a gang troll?  Andrew
